home.title: Welcome to the Judge Booth!
home.description: The Judge Booth was created to allow players to interact with judges as a group of individuals who share a passion, who are fun to hang out with, and whom they can befriend and trust, as opposed to just people in positions of authority. The booth wants to make a connection between judges and players.
home.statistics: There are {{questions}} questions from {{sets}} sets and {{languages}} languages, written by more than {{authors}} authors. You currently have selected {{filtered}} of these questions.
